How it Works

Get started in four simple steps to collect anonymous student feedback and improve your teaching

Sign Up

Create your free account in seconds using a simple form or single sign-on (Google or institutional email). No credit card required.

Add Courses and Questions

Easily add your courses and customize feedback questions to match your teaching style. Choose from templates or create your own.

Collect Feedback

Share anonymous feedback forms via a link, QR code, or email. Students respond quickly on any device, ensuring high participation

Analyze & Improve

Get real-time, actionable insights through clear reports and visualizations. Identify strengths and track progress to enhance your teaching

FAQ

Answers to FAQs

Yes, student identities are fully protected. Our platform ensures complete anonymity so students can provide honest feedback without fear of repercussions.

Setup takes just 5 minutes! You can create your account, add courses, and start collecting feedback in no time.

Absolutely! You can create custom questions tailored to your specific courses and teaching style, or choose from our pre-built templates.

Yes, we take data security seriously. All data is encrypted and stored securely, and we comply with educational privacy standards to protect both instructor and student information.
